location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from the Secretary to the Agent of the Governor General and Chief Commissioner, Rajpootana [R훮jasth훮n] to J Gordon, Secretary to the Bombay Chamber of Commerce

mods.abstract: Letter in response to letter No. 2465 requesting that the thanks of the chamber be conveyed to Lewis Pelly for the valuable information and great assistance he provided to the chamber with regards to the speedy construction of the line between Delhi and Ahmedabad [Ahmad훮b훮d].
